snippet: The Pelican brand of protective cases for electronics overhauled its marketing strategy to reach more consumers by adding a Web presence and print and television ads.
abstract: Gregory Schmidt Advertising column highlights campaign by Pelican Products for its brand of protective cases for electronics; notes it is overhauling its marketing strategy to reach more consumers.
lead_paragraph: The Pelican brand of protective cases for electronics overhauled its marketing strategy to reach more consumers by adding a Web presence and print and television ads.

headline.seo: Pelican Products Maneuvers to Add Customers Without Losing Any - Advertising
headline.main: A Product With Devotees Tries to Widen Its Niche
headline.print_headline: A Product With Devotees Tries to Widen Its Niche
